Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.pdf

Class DocMDP

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.pdf.PDDocumentUtils
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.pdf.Transformation
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.pdf.DocMDP
Direct Known Subclasses:
FieldMDPTransformation
public class DocMDP extends Transformation
Esta classe é responsável pela validação das persmissões do DocMDP (Document Modification Detection and Prevention).
